items.title: AutoCAD Productivity Suite
items.description: Custom .NET plugins and advanced LISP routines developed to automate repetitive civil drafting and site level coordination tasks.
items.details: Focused on increasing drafting efficiency by 40% through automated layer management, coordinate extraction, and batch printing utilities specifically for site layouts. Proven on multiple real-world residential and commercial site plans.

items.title: Revit BIM Automation Pro
items.description: A comprehensive library of pyRevit scripts designed for advanced BIM modelling, automated parameter syncing, and data-driven QA/QC.
items.details: Includes tools for automated Room Data Sheet generation, parameter auditing, and bulk sheet naming. Currently used to maintain model health in complex B.Tech final year college projects and site coordination.

items.title: Digital PDF Flip-Book Engine
items.description: An interactive digital publication engine developed to convert traditional PDF documents into immersive 3D flip-books with real-time physics.
items.details: Engineered a custom flip-book interface using HTML/CSS/JS that simulates physical page physics and lighting. Designed to showcase technical articles and magazines in a modern, engaging digital format.

items.title: Personal Finance Tracker
items.description: A lightweight, secure money tracking web app designed for managing personal expenses and visualizing monthly financial trends.
items.details: Developed as a utility tool for students and individuals to track spending. Features include expense logging, categorical visualization, and historical data persistence via local storage/backend integration.

items.title: AEC Calculation Engine
items.description: A suite of high-precision engineering calculators integrated directly into the web, bridging structural analysis formulas with interactive UI.
items.details: Includes the Beam Analyzer, Gradient Solver, and Scale Converter. These tools allow site engineers to perform complex checks on-site without needing heavy desktop software, ensuring data-driven decisions on the ground.
